actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section 521 of title 38, United States Code, so as to continue the allowances for aid and attendance or house-bound whenever a veteran's income changes and exceeds the statutory maximum.

summary.text: Authorizes the continuance of the payment of allowances for aid and attendance disability sums to a veteran should the income status of the veteran change. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 521)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 521 of title 38, United States Code, so as to continue the allowances for aid and attendance or house-bound whenever a veteran's income changes and exceeds the statutory maximum.
